headline: Oilfield Equipment Rental Market is Projected with a Value of USD 31.80 Billion by 2032, Driven by Increasing Shale Exploration Activities | Report by SNS Insider
summary: The rise in demand for Oilfield Equipment Rental-based operational efficiency solutions continues to accelerate due to technological advancements and increasing shale exploration worldwide.Austin, July 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Oilfield Equipment Rental Market Size was valued at USD 23.53 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 31.80 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 3.84% over the forecast period of 2025-2032.
